item.title: Note to self - slides for staying sane when maintaining a popular open source project
item.description: Note to self - slides for staying sane when maintaining a popular open source project # For further reference - Simon MacDonald has a great collection of good advise on how to stay sane when running and maintaining a popular open source project. Link here: http://s.apache.org/sanity Some things he mentioned: Include a README. It should tell people what the project is about but also what the project is not about.
